queue.fact_text: On 29 December 1972, Eastern Air Lines Flight 401, a Lockheed L‑1011 TriStar, crashed into the Florida Everglades after its crew became distracted by a faulty landing-gear indicator light. queue.fact_text: On 29 December 1989, Japan’s Nikkei 225 stock index hit its all‑time intraday high of 38,957.44 and an all‑time closing high of 38,915.87. queue.fact_text: On 29 December 1996, the Guatemalan government and the Guatemalan National Revolutionary Unity signed peace accords that brought an official end to a brutal 36‑year civil war. The conflict had left hundreds of thousands dead or disappeared, many of them Indigenous Maya civilians.
